body.content:
Dear Reserving actuary,

Our system encountered an error while attempting to upload files to Arius.

Upload details:

  • Status - FAILED
  • Error time - {uploadedTime}

Please manually upload the files to Arius or rerun the pipeline from your Fabric workspace.

If you have any questions or require assistance, please contact our support team at DnAClaims@guardinsurancegroup.onmicrosoft.com.

Thank you!
